title: Village Tandoori
typeOfFood: Indian, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened early 2013, off the beachfront promenade in the hotel/resort area of Torrox Costa, a festive, automobile-free zone. On a clear day, you can see the north coast of Africa. Aug 2014 reported change of ownership and food is now pre-cooked, so you can't custom order.
streetAddress: Paseo Maritimo de Ferrara, Promenade Bloque 80
